text: Arturo Lona Reyes (November 1, 1925 â€“ October 31, 2020) was a Mexican bishop. He was the Catholic bishop. He was born in Tehuantepec, Oaxaca. For 30 years, he was the Bishop of Tehuantepec from 1971 to 2001. Reyes died of COVID-19 on October 31, 2020 in Tehuantepec, one day before his 95th birthday. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops
title: Arturo Lona Reyes
